properties.name: management.health.refresh.enabled
properties.description: Enable the health endpoint for the refresh scope.

properties.name: management.endpoint.env.post.enabled
properties.description: Enable changing the Environment through a POST to /env.

properties.name: management.endpoint.refresh.enabled
properties.description: Enable the /refresh endpoint to refresh configuration and re-initialize refresh scoped beans.

properties.name: management.endpoint.restart.enabled
properties.description: Enable the /restart endpoint to restart the application context.

properties.name: spring.cloud.refresh.extra-refreshable
properties.description: Additional class names for beans to post process into refresh scope.
